ygData.subject: Re: Charred Guardian Breastplate
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hell yeah! Keep us on the cutting edge! Btw, what level are you to get all this charred stuff, Rufane? DV PS: The shield is the charred guardian shield, it
ygData.messageBody:
> Yes, i just traded for mine the other day...its from solusek A off one
> of the gnome clockworks the name is
> CWG model EXG, it either drops a charred shield(im not sure the stats
> but my cleric and druid guild mates love it) or the charred breastplate.
> It is indeed black wich is nice for us dark knights.
> Also i just got some charred gauntlets AC 7 +3 str +6 stamina also black
> plate! I think it was off some efreeti down there? so there must be
> more charred plate items in SOL A, i will be heading there soon to stock
> up...
> if anyone finds more black plate plz tell the list =D

Hell yeah! Keep us on the cutting edge! Btw, what level are you to get all
this charred stuff, Rufane?

DV

PS: The shield is the charred guardian shield, it gives Wis + 9, so that's
why they love it.
